name: Scrimmy Bingus and the Crungy Spingus
name_original: Scrimmy Bingus and the Crungy Spingus
description:
welcome to scrimmy bingus and the crungy spingus, the game where you have to find that bingus

each level unlocks a new brongus to play with, but you start with 3

Bippo - he doo music and stuf

Pelb - she grumpy

Tootsy - ???

make sure u orangate the crungus before u play and have a good time!

Created by Crogus Interactive for Isaac.
